title: 27.) Top 40 Countdown - My Mom Sheltered Me Too Much
description:
Mark is different from his friends and believes it's a negative that his mother raised him to be a God-fearing, rule-following young man. - Dr. Laura: "People who are too hard on themselves don't rise to their full potential."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
